signature_matches.name: reference anti-VM strings targeting Xen
signature_matches.description: anti-analysis/anti-vm/vm-detection
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: reference anti-VM strings targeting Xen
    namespace: anti-analysis/anti-vm/vm-detection
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: file
      dynamic: file
    att&ck:
      - Defense Evasion::Virtualization/Sandbox Evasion::System Checks [T1497.001]
    mbc:
      - Anti-Behavioral Analysis::Virtual Machine Detection [B0009]
    references:
      - https://github.com/LordNoteworthy/al-khaser/blob/master/al-khaser/AntiVM/Xen.cpp
    examples:
      - al-khaser_x86.exe_
  features:
    - or:
      - string: /^Xen/i
      - string: /XenVMMXenVMM/i
      - string: /xenservice\.exe/i
      - string: /HVM domU/i

signature_matches.name: queries_computer_name
signature_matches.description: Queries computer hostname

signature_matches.name: stealth_timeout
signature_matches.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

signature_matches.name: packer_unknown_pe_section_name
signature_matches.description: The binary contains an unknown PE section name indicative of packing

signature_matches.name: packer_entropy
signature_matches.description: The binary likely contains encrypted or compressed data

signature_matches.name: antisandbox_sboxie_libs
signature_matches.description: Detects Sandboxie through the presence of a library

Queries a list of all running drivers

Performs DNS lookups

Tries to detect debuggers (CloseHandle check)

signature_matches.description: Creates mutexes
